DESCRIPTION: A secondary resource, similar to energy. Gained by #yWinding #yUp.
Turn your winder, gaining some amount of #ycharge.
Spend some of your charge to perform an action. If you don't have enough charge, you lose none and the action isn't performed.
Spend ALL charge to perform an action. The action's power depends on how much charge was spent.
Cogwheels passively grant #yCharge at the start of your turn.
The next time you try to #ySpin without enough charge, a Battery will be consumed to supply that much charge.
Parts are cards which, if in your hand at the end of your turn, activate to perform an effect. They can also be activated by certain other cards.
When attacked, dizzy creatures lose #yStrength for that turn.
Attuned cards trigger the current tool's effect when they're played or their part effect is activated.
